channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 雅各布-罗斯柴尔德（Jacob Rothschild）是一位银行家和慈善家，他背弃了欧洲最大的银行王朝，建立了自己的金融帝国。享年 87 岁
item.description:
Jacob Rothschild, the banker and philanthropist who turned his back on Europe’s biggest banking dynasty to build his own financial empire, has died. He was 87 https://t.co/iisj0e6uJh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）提拔私人财富管理高管米纳-弗林（Meena Flynn）共同领导其 "一个高盛 "计划，此举凸显了这家华尔街巨头为建立面向全球超级富豪的服务所做的努力。
item.description:
Goldman Sachs promoted top private wealth-management executive Meena Flynn to co-lead its One Goldman Sachs initiative, a move that underscores the Wall Street giant’s effort to build out services targeting the world’s ultra-wealthy. https://t.co/ZpIWyDokjs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 由于建筑商和购房者利用了年初较低的抵押贷款利率，美国 1 月份的新房销售量略有上升。
item.description:
Sales of new homes in the US edged higher in January as builders and buyers capitalized on lower mortgage rates at the start of the year. https://t.co/Ubb0lNC9me

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 运动有益身心和事业。Work Shift》专栏作家朱莉娅-霍布斯鲍姆提出了在职锻炼的理由
item.description:
Exercise is good for the mind, the body — and the career. Work Shift columnist Julia Hobsbawm makes the case for on-the-job workouts https://t.co/HJm1hCH8jW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 高管们被迫出售他们在美国上市的股票，因为他们将这些股票作为个人贷款的抵押品。
item.description:
Executives have been forced to sell their slumping US-listed shares after they pledged them as collateral for personal loans. https://t.co/mmu9GwcPND

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 一位官员表示，尽管实施了多轮制裁，但仍有数千万欧元被禁敏感商品的贸易源于俄罗斯集团本身
item.description:
Tens of millions of euros of trade in banned sensitive goods to Russia continue to originate from the bloc itself, despite multiple rounds of sanctions, an official says https://t.co/69RYHoiq7O

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 彭博绿色通讯社今天的天气雷达上有什么？美国部分地区初现春意。
item.description:
What's on Bloomberg Green's weather radar today? Early signs of spring in parts of the US. https://t.co/ZFJpFSJSPl

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 以色列央行周一没有降息，而是警惕更大规模战争的风险，而今年的经济反弹又加重了对通货膨胀的担忧。
item.description:
Israel refrained from cutting interest rates on Monday, with the central bank on alert for risks of a wider war while an economic bounce-back this year adds to worries about inflation https://t.co/ZFAOpBG1kv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: Volocopter 计划在今年夏天用电池驱动的空中出租车接送奥运观众穿越巴黎，但由于获得监管部门批准的时间紧迫以及关键部件的短缺，该计划面临的困难越来越大。
item.description:
Volocopter's plan to whisk Olympics attendees across Paris in battery-powered air taxis this summer faces steepening odds as time runs short to secure regulatory approval and key components https://t.co/wQHihXLNNQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）说，欧盟迄今只交付了该集团承诺提供给乌克兰的火炮弹药的三分之一左右
item.description:
Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy says the European Union has so far only delivered about a third of the artillery ammunition the bloc pledged for his country https://t.co/GLlHqGHFGa

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 一项针对英国住房市场的竞争调查清楚地表明了主要问题所在--规划系统。这对房屋建筑商和 99% 抵押贷款意味着什么？
item.description:
A competition probe into the UK's housing market has made it pretty clear where the main problems lie - in the planning system. What does that mean for housebuilders, and for 99% mortgages? https://t.co/VrvUKSyzpM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 德意志银行投资部门 DWS 集团另类资产主管保罗-凯利（Paul Kelly）认为，由于信贷紧缩，办公楼物业开发项目目前可能是 "有趣的贷款机会"。
item.description:
Office property developments can be “interesting lending opportunities” right now as a result of the a credit crunch, according to Paul Kelly, the head of alternative assets at Deutsche Bank's investment arm DWS Group https://t.co/zlt4CbkXuS

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登总统的高级国家安全助理向众议院共和党人施压，要求解除对乌克兰的援助

President Joe Biden’s top national security aide pressed House Republicans to unlock assistance to Ukraine https://t.co/MBxuazL5IC

item.title: 欧洲央行理事会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）认为，欧洲央行面临着比美联储更严峻的挑战，他认为欧洲央行将在 6 月份首次降息。
item.description:
The ECB is facing tougher challenges than the Fed, according to Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras, who sees a first rate cut in June https://t.co/r0utjSNmMT

item.title: 德国将允许重工业在地下运输和储存碳，这颠覆了政府最初的立场
item.description:
Germany will allow heavy industries to transport and store carbon underground, a reversal of the government’s original stance https://t.co/7o9SQUyftC

item.title: @MerrynSW说："担心住房短缺的英国官员应该把重点放在让老年人离开房产阶梯上，而不是让年轻人登上房产阶梯。
item.description:
UK officials worried about the housing shortage should focus on getting seniors off the property ladder instead of getting young people on, says @MerrynSW (via @opinion) https://t.co/IEcWsI667w

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 世界上许多最大的镍矿正面临着日益暗淡的前景，因为它们正面临着生存的威胁：来自印度尼西亚的供应几乎是无限的。
item.description:
Many of the world’s biggest nickel mines are facing an increasingly bleak future as they wake up to an existential threat: a near limitless supply from Indonesia https://t.co/ulAF6iihDp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 破产的加密货币贷款机构创世环球资本（Genesis Global Capital）正面临着一个意想不到的对手，该公司正寻求法院批准其向债权人分配数十亿美元资产的方案
item.description:
Bankrupt crypto lender Genesis Global Capital is facing an unexpected opponent as it seeks court approval on its proposal for distributing billions of dollars in assets to creditors https://t.co/j1BAqpr6iv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 几内亚工会周一开始无限期罢工，要求结束对互联网和广播的限制
item.description:
Guinea labor unions start an indefinite strike Monday to demand an end to internet and radio restrictions https://t.co/hDQtKMztNZ

item.title: 阿布扎比计划出售欧洲债券，这是该酋长国自 2021 年以来首次发行债券，将加入今年新兴经济体发行债券的行列。
item.description:
Abu Dhabi plans a Eurobond sale, the emirate’s first bond since 2021, to join a flurry of issuance by emerging economies this year https://t.co/g4zieOhIXQ

item.title: 亿万富翁、南非零售业大王克里斯托-韦塞为什么要寻找钻石？以下是这位八旬老人的未来计划
item.description:

item.title: 高盛和摩根士丹利越来越愿意暂时持有新的抵押贷款债务中风险最高的部分
item.description:
Goldman Sachs and Morgan Stanley are increasingly willing to temporarily hold onto some of the riskiest parts of new collateralized loan obligations https://t.co/B56dg4vW7C

item.title: 据知情人士透露，最近被蒙特利尔银行金属和矿业部门解雇的初级银行家们利用工作共享平台传播粗俗的笑话和至少一张淫秽图片
item.description:
Junior bankers who were recently fired from Bank of Montreal’s metals and mining group used work-sharing platforms to circulate crude jokes and at least one obscene image, according to people with knowledge of the matter https://t.co/eMIKA9Wr00

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 今年隔夜资金市场的稳定让策略师们认为，美联储将能够继续让其资产负债表缩减
item.description:
The stability in overnight funding markets this year has strategists suggesting that the Fed will be able to continue letting its balance sheet run down https://t.co/3USKjGl4ro
